selector.path: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, form, p
table.dataOutput thead th a, table.dataOutput thead th a:hover, table.dataOutput thead th a:active, table.dataOutput thead th a:visited
.tabsBar li.selected a, .tabsBar li.selected a:hover, .tabsBar li.selected a:visited
.foldableBox h3 a:link, .foldableBox h3 a:visited, .foldableBox h3 a:hover, .foldableBox h3 a:visited:hover
.userServices a, .userServices a:link, .userServices a:hover, .userServices a:visited, .userServices a:active, .userServices a:visited:hover
